awards:
第48届台北金马影展(2011)
　　NETPAC奖(提名) 拉齐·卡斯万迪

　　第5届亚洲电影大奖(2011)
　　最佳女配角(提名) 珊迪·帕雷德斯
　　最佳美术指导(提名) Eros Eflin

director.name: 拉齐·卡斯万迪 Lucky Kuswandi

introduction: When the capital in the middle of nowhere KANJENG BADAI threatened by the emergence of a militant and his political party and homophobia, the security of this country depends on the ADAM, a stylist. With the power of makeup bag and personal hygiene kits and sexy mix of martial arts and dance movement, Adam should beat with Kanjeng Badai ordered before the enemy had won the election. It is her high heels became moccasins, bright makeup dust, or leather pants as his canvas pants? When everything becomes vague, one thing is certain: Adam must fulfill his destiny as a super hero Madame X.
